trans-unit.source: Specifies the XML namespace and XML namespace prefix to use for a service description format extension within a service description.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 XML 命名空间和 XML 命名空间前缀，用于在服务说明的服务说明格式扩展。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A service description format extension extends how a service description is generated for an XML Web service created using ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明格式扩展扩展如何为使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web 服务生成服务说明。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a service description format extension adds XML elements to the service description.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，服务说明格式扩展将 XML 元素添加到服务说明。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when a SOAP extension is built to run on both the client and server side of an XML Web service, as information about SOAP extensions is not placed in the service description.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 扩展生成的 XML Web 服务的客户端和服务器端运行因为有关 SOAP 扩展的信息将不会置于的服务说明时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: If you add information about the SOAP extension to the service description, a client can interpret that it must run the specific SOAP extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将有关 SOAP 扩展的信息添加到服务说明时，客户端可以解释它必须运行特定的 SOAP 扩展。

trans-unit.source: An example of a SOAP extension that must run on both the client and server is an encryption SOAP extension.
trans-unit.target: 必须在客户端和服务器运行的 SOAP 扩展的一个示例是加密 SOAP 扩展。

trans-unit.source: If an encryption SOAP extension runs on only the server, and it encrypts return values before sending them back to the client, the client must have the SOAP extension running to decrypt the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: 如果只在服务器上运行加密 SOAP 扩展并将返回值将其发送回客户端之前对其加密时，客户端必须运行才能解密该 SOAP 消息的 SOAP 扩展。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the client cannot process the return value.
trans-unit.target: 否则，客户端无法处理的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to build a service description format extension: 1.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下步骤生成服务说明格式扩展︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Build a class that derives from <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>.
trans-unit.target: 生成从<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension>派生的类

trans-unit.source: Apply an <xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionAttribute> to the class and specify the extension points at which the service description format extension should run.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionAttribute>到类并指定应从该处运行的服务说明格式扩展的扩展点。</xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, apply an <xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute> to the class and specify a member within the class that acts as a new extension point.
trans-unit.target: 根据需要应用<xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute>到类并指定的类中作为新的扩展点的成员。</xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Optionally, apply an XmlFormatExtensionPrefixAttribute to the class and specify the XML namespace prefix to be associated with XML elements generated by the service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: （可选） 将 XmlFormatExtensionPrefixAttribute 应用于类并指定要使用的生成的服务说明格式扩展的 XML 元素关联的 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: Configure the service description format extension to run within the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置要在中运行的服务说明格式扩展`serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes`配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPrefixAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPrefixAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPrefixAttribute"></xref> class, setting the XML namespace and XML namespace prefix for a service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.XmlFormatExtensionPrefixAttribute"></xref>类，设置的 XML 命名空间和服务说明格式扩展的 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace prefix associated with a service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: 与服务说明格式扩展关联的 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace associated with a service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明格式扩展关联的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace associated with a service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与服务说明格式扩展关联的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace associated with a service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: 服务说明格式扩展关联的 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace prefix associated with a service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与服务说明格式扩展关联的 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace prefix associated with a service description format extension.
trans-unit.target: 与服务说明格式扩展关联的 XML 命名空间前缀。
